dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, April 1st in Almaty, sounds like, totally fine, right? Like clear skies, maybe a little spring shower.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, April first in Almaty, sounds like, totally fine, right? Like clear skies, maybe a little spring shower.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, actually, no, A. Far from it. Kazhydromet just put out a pretty serious warning for then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, actually, no, A. Far from it. Kazhydromet just put out a pretty serious warning for then.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet warned residents of Almaty and other cities in different regions of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A warning? For, like, what? What's happening on April 1st?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A warning? For, like, what? What's happening on April first?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they're expecting what they call "unfavorable meteorological conditions."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they're expecting what they call unfavorable meteorological conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On April 1, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions of air pollution are expected in the cities of Karaganda, Zhezkazgan, Balkhash, Temirtau, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Shymkent, Almaty," the report says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unfavorable... meteor—what does that even mean, B? Is that just, like, bad weather?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unfavorable... meteor-what does that even mean, B? Is that just, like, bad weather?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Not exactly, A. It's, um, a specific combo of things. Think calm winds, like, almost no breeze.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not exactly, A. It's, um, a specific combo of things. Think calm winds, like, almost no breeze.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfavorable meteorological conditions are a combination of short-term meteorological factors (calm, light wind, fog, inversion), which contribute to the accumulation of harmful (polluting) substances in the surface layer of atmospheric air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. And sometimes fog, too. The big one, though, is what's called an inversion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. And sometimes fog, too. The big one, though, is what's called an inversion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfavorable meteorological conditions are a combination of short-term meteorological factors (calm, light wind, fog, inversion), which contribute to the accumulation of harmful (polluting) substances in the surface layer of atmospheric air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Inversion? Like, the air flips upside down?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Inversion? Like, the air flips upside down?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sort of. It's when warm air traps cooler air below it. And, uh, that lower air, it just can't, like, escape.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sort of. It's when warm air traps cooler air below it. And, uh, that lower air, it just can't, like, escape.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh. So if there's pollution down there, it just... stays?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh. So if there's pollution down there, it just... stays?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It accumulates. That's, uh, what makes these conditions unfavorable. For breathing, anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It accumulates. That's, uh, what makes these conditions unfavorable. For breathing, anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unfavorable meteorological conditions are a combination of short-term meteorological factors (calm, light wind, fog, inversion), which contribute to the accumulation of harmful (polluting) substances in the surface layer of atmospheric air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So this is, like, a pollution warning then. Which cities are even affected by this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So this is, like, a pollution warning then. Which cities are even affected by this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a big list actually. Karaganda, Zhezkazgan, Balkhash, Temirtau, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Shymkent. And, um, Almaty too, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a big list actually. Karaganda, Zhezkazgan, Balkhash, Temirtau, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Shymkent. And, um, Almaty too, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On April 1, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions of air pollution are expected in the cities of Karaganda, Zhezkazgan, Balkhash, Temirtau, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Shymkent, Almaty," the report says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Almaty. What's the, like, actual weather forecast for Almaty that day? Besides the pollution stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Almaty. What's the, like, actual weather forecast for Almaty that day? Besides the pollution stuff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, variable cloudiness, no precipitation. East wind, uh, pretty light, 3-8 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, variable cloudiness, no precipitation. East wind, uh, pretty light, three to eight meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 1, the metropolis is expected to have variable cloudiness, no precipitation. East wind 3-8 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No rain, huh? That's, like, not going to help clear things out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No rain, huh? That's, like, not going to help clear things out.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. And temps are looking like 3-5 at night, up to 15-17 during the day. So, uh, deceptively pleasant on the surface.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. And temps are looking like three to five at night, up to fifteen to seventeen during the day. So, uh, deceptively pleasant on the surface.
